text.section: If distributed in bulk, a written or printed statement of the information required by subsection (a) of this section shall accompany delivery and be supplied to the purchaser at the time of delivery.

Any fertilizer mixed or blended according to a formula furnished by a purchaser shall be marked plainly or tagged with the words "buyer's mixture", or "mixed-to-order", or "custom-mix" together with a statement containing the following information:
Net weight;
The guaranteed analysis giving the minimum percentage of every plant nutrient claimed to be contained in the fertilizer; and
Name and address of the manufacturer. In addition, the amounts or kinds of materials used in the formulation may be shown.

section.section: Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a specialty fertilizer shall be labeled to contain all information required by subsection (a) of this section.

The information required under paragraphs (1) and (2) of this subsection shall be printed in a legible and conspicuous manner on at least one side of the container, or if it does not appear on the face or display side of the container, it shall appear on the upper third of the side used.

Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, on or after April 1, 2011, a lawn fertilizer with an available phosphate (P2O5) content greater than 5%:
May not be labeled for use on established lawns or grass;
May not be labeled with spreader settings; and
Shall be marked with the words "NOT FOR USE ON ESTABLISHED LAWNS OR GRASS" in at least a three-quarter inch font and in a legible and conspicuous manner on the front side of the container.
This subsection does not apply to seed starter fertilizer for use on newly established lawns or turf.
